message: Let's start fair, I'll take the majority, but you get a decent share. What do you say?
I'll start with a fair offer. You can't do better than this, can you?
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it more evenly this time. Take it or leave it!
I'm not getting any younger, and I'm not getting any richer. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. Take it or leave it!
